name: WarGrowlmon_X
description: WarGrowlmon X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody . It gained the ability to change the extraordinary power of the " Digital Hazard " contained within its body into a variety of energy shots and fire them from the attack units on each part of it, and is called the "Deep-crimson Heavy Tank". The giant cannon on its chest is used to fire its Atomic Megalo Blaster.
